content:
{
  "arrowParens": "always",
  "bracketSpacing": true,
  "insertPragma": false,
  "printWidth": 120,
  "proseWrap": "preserve",
  "quoteProps": "as-needed",
  "requirePragma": false,
  "semi": true,
  "singleQuote": true,
  "tabWidth": 2,
  "trailingComma": "none",
  "useTabs": true,
  "endOfLine": "auto",
  "overrides": [
    {
      "files": ".prettierrc",
      "options": { "parser": "typescript" }
    }
  ]
}
